clumpy.definition.Land¶

class clumpy.definition.Land(features, de=None, isl_ratio=1.0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Land object which refers to a given initial state.

Parameters

  • features (list(FeaturesLayer) or list(State)) – List of features where a State means a distance layer to the corresponding state.

  • de ({'gkde'} or DensityEstimator, default='gkde') –

    Density estimation for \(P(x|u)\).

    gkde : Gaussian Kernel Density Estimation method

Methods

add_conditional_density_estimation(state[, de])

Add conditional density for a given final state.

add_transition_patches(state, transition_patches)

Add transition patches for a given final state.
add_conditional_density_estimation(state, de=None)[source]¶

Add conditional density for a given final state.

Parameters

  • state (State) – The final state.

  • de ({'gkde'} or DensityEstimator, default='gkde') –

    Density estimation for \(P(x|u,v)\).

    gkde : Gaussian Kernel Density Estimation method

Returns

self – The self object.

Return type

Land

add_transition_patches(state, transition_patches)[source]¶

Add transition patches for a given final state.

Parameters

  • state (State) – The final state.

  • transition_patches (TransitionPatches) – The transition patches

Returns

self – The self object.

Return type

Land
